bibl.title: Papyrology and the History of Early Islamic Egypt
bibl.author: TORALLAS TOVAR, Sofia

bibl.note: [Introduction.] - The Sources. - Linguistic Diagnosis. - Lexical Borrowings. - Startegies of Adaptation. - Other Lexical Interference Phenomena. - Calque or Semantical Borrowing. - Construction Loan or Structural Loan. - Conclusions. - Bibliography. - Pp. 178-198: Appendix: Egyptian Loan Words in Greek.
TORALLAS TOVAR Sofia, Egyptian Lexical Interference in the Greek of Byzantine and Early Islamic Egypt.
